story.title: Our Story
story.text: Before DisPERS (Disaster Preparedness and Emergency Response System), Barangay Bagong Silangan relied on manual methods to disseminate critical alerts during disasters — leading to delays, confusion, and risks to resident safety. Recognizing this need, DAMBRSS partnered with barangay officials to develop a better solution. The result is DisPERS, a web-based platform built for the people of Barangay Bagong Silangan. Through close coordination with BDRRM, BHERT, and CCTV security personnel, we tailored the system to be easy to use, secure, and accessible — even under pressure. DisPERS is more than just a system — it’s a tool for saving lives.

values.title: Innovation
values.text: We build tech that speeds up disaster alerts, improves tracking, and supports real-time response.

values.title: Integrity
values.text: We protect data with strong security, verified logins, and transparent system use.

values.title: Impact
values.text: We help communities stay safer with faster warnings, clear info, and efficient evacuations.
